plot: Pepito is a small cowboy, who helps the sheriff to solve crimes and catch baddies, with the help of his horse, Huracan, and his dog Amigo.
title: Los amigos Maravilla en el mundo de la aventura
plot_es: Pepito is a small cowboy, who helps the sheriff to solve crimes and catch baddies, with the help of his horse, Huracan, and his dog Amigo.
original_name: Los amigos Maravilla en el mundo de la aventura
